## MetricValueType type

metric value type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MetricValueType = 'confirmed' | 'dead' | 'recovered' | 'active';
```

## Example


```ts
{
  confirmed: 1,
  dead: 1,
  recovered: 1,
  active: 1,
}
```
